name: STARCROSSED (The Tragic Odyssey of a Galactic Love Triangle)
name_original: STARCROSSED (The Tragic Odyssey of a Galactic Love Triangle)
description:
~Made in 48 Hours for the University of  Utah's Feb 2022 Game Jam~

Life in space can get lonely, especially when you're a supermassive black hole. It seems like anything you get close to just... disappears! Two brothers, cursed by the nature of their existence, keep each other company in the swirling darkness.

Then one day, everything changes, when the two of them come across the cutest, bluest planet in the galaxy: the lovely, lively Earth. 

But before either of them can seal the deal, danger strikes - a storm of asteroids now threatens to batter their newfound love to death! Can these two brothers guide their planetary darling away from harm, without accidentally consuming her in the process?

Use gravity-based controls to guide and protect the Earth! But beware of getting too close...

===========

Controls (if playing alone, use both):

WASD: Control Black Hole #1

Arrows: Control Black Hole #2

Esc: Pause Menu
